fields.name: ChatGPT
fields.description: OpenAI's conversational AI that can assist with writing, coding, analysis, and creative tasks through natural language interactions.
usage_tips: Ask it to explain complex concepts in simple terms
Use it for brainstorming and ideation sessions
Request step-by-step coding help with explanations
Have it review and improve your writing
Create custom instructions to tailor responses to your needs

fields.name: Claude
fields.description: Anthropic's AI assistant known for nuanced conversations, detailed analysis, and strong capabilities in coding and long-form content.
usage_tips: Leverage its 200K token context window for analyzing long documents
Ask for detailed, well-reasoned explanations
Use it for code review with thorough feedback
Request structured analysis with clear reasoning
Upload PDFs and documents for comprehensive analysis

fields.name: Midjourney
fields.description: AI-powered image generation tool that creates stunning, artistic visuals from text descriptions through Discord.
usage_tips: Start with simple prompts and iterate with parameters
Use aspect ratio flags (--ar) to control image dimensions
Combine artistic styles and mediums in your prompts
Use the /describe command to learn from existing images
Experiment with chaos values (--c) for varied results

fields.name: GitHub Copilot
fields.description: AI pair programmer that suggests code completions and entire functions in your IDE as you type.
usage_tips: Write descriptive comments to guide better suggestions
Use it to generate boilerplate and repetitive code
Accept suggestions with Tab, cycle through alternatives
Ask Copilot Chat questions about your codebase
Use it to learn new libraries and frameworks

fields.name: Notion AI
fields.description: AI features integrated into Notion to help with writing, brainstorming, and organizing information in your workspace.
usage_tips: Use AI to generate first drafts of documents
Ask it to summarize long meeting notes
Have it create action items from discussions
Use AI to translate content into multiple languages
Ask it to change tone or simplify complex text

fields.name: Perplexity
fields.description: AI-powered search engine that provides direct answers with sources, combining search and conversational AI.
usage_tips: Use it for research that needs citations
Ask follow-up questions to dig deeper
Use Pro Search for academic or detailed research
Check the sources provided for verification
Save searches to collections for later reference

fields.name: Runway
fields.description: AI-powered creative suite for video editing, generation, and effects with cutting-edge generative AI models.
usage_tips: Use text-to-video for quick concept visualization
Try image-to-video to animate static images
Use inpainting to remove or modify video elements
Experiment with style transfer on existing footage
Combine multiple AI tools for complex effects

fields.name: Grammarly
fields.description: AI writing assistant that helps with grammar, spelling, style, and tone across all your writing.
usage_tips: Set goals for audience, formality, and intent
Use tone detection to match your desired voice
Review clarity and engagement suggestions
Check plagiarism for academic writing
Use browser extension for writing everywhere

fields.name: Jasper
fields.description: AI content platform designed for marketing teams to create on-brand content at scale.
usage_tips: Train it on your brand voice and style
Use templates for specific content types
Leverage the AI art generator for visuals
Create content briefs before generating
Use campaigns to keep content organized

fields.name: Cursor
fields.description: AI-first code editor built on VS Code, designed for AI-assisted development with deep codebase understanding.
usage_tips: Use Cmd+K to edit code with natural language
Chat with your entire codebase for context
Use @-mentions to reference specific files
Apply suggested changes with one click
Leverage AI to understand unfamiliar code
